SEARCH

Package Menu

package Menu
The `Menu` package contains classes that define user interfaces and menus for interacting with the system. This package serves as the user-facing interface to access various functionalities and features of the system. It includes subpackages for specific menu categories, such as `CampHandler` for camp-related operations and `CommentHandler` for comment-related operations. Users, including students, staff, and administrators, can use the classes in this package to navigate through the system, perform actions, and access information. The classes here provide a structured and user-friendly way to interact with the underlying functionality of the system.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    Menu.CampHandlers
    The `CampHandler` subpackage contains classes that handle various operations and interactions related to camps within the system.
    Menu.CommentHandler
    The `CommentHandler` subpackage contains classes and interfaces related to managing and handling comments within the system.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminMenu
    The `AdminMenu` class represents the menu and functionality available to an administrator user.
    asciiart
    The `asciiart` class provides ASCII art titles and end credits for the application.
    AuthenticationMenu
    The `AuthenticationMenu` class represents a menu for user authentication and related actions.
    CommentMenu
    The abstract base class for menus related to comments within the Camp Management System.
    CommitteeMenu
    The `CommitteeMenu` class represents a menu for committee members (students) to interact with the system.
    FilterCamp
    The `FilterCamp` class provides utility methods for filtering and selecting camps based on various criteria.
    ReportMenu
    The `ReportMenu` class provides a menu for generating various reports related to a selected camp.
    StaffEnquiryMenu
    The `StaffEnquiryMenu` class represents a menu for staff members to manage and respond to enquiries within the Camp Management System.
    StaffMenu
    The `StaffMenu` class represents the menu for staff members.
    StaffSuggestionMenu
    The `StaffSuggestionMenu` class represents a menu for staff members to manage and respond to suggestions within the Camp Management System.
    StudentEnquiryMenu
    The `StudentEnquiryMenu` class represents a menu for students to manage and interact with enquiry comments within the Camp Management System.
    StudentMenu
    The `StudentMenu` class provides a menu for student users to perform various actions, including joining camps, viewing available and joined camps, withdrawing from registered camps, view and raise enquiries, and accessing the committee menu (if applicable).
    StudentSuggestionMenu
    The `StudentSuggestionMenu` class represents a menu for students to manage and interact with suggestion comments within the Camp Management System.
    UserMenu
    The `UserMenu` abstract class represents a menu for a user with common functionalities.
